content.heading: You make a living by what you get.. you make a life by what you give..
If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself
The foundation for future prosperity is built on the bedrock of good jobs and great schools..
The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. - Steve Jobs.
Until you dig a hole, you plant a tree, you water it and make it survive, you haven't done a thing.

newsUpdate: New Registrations Open ! We are back with our third batch of Free Virtual NEET Coaching Classes. Apply now by filling out the form .......... We are looking for tutors for our NEET Classes! Interested applicants can fill out the registration form ........Now you can be a part of Team Kanaa too! Register as a volunteer....

info.title: Dream - If you can dream it you can do it
info.description: We are here to make it happen by being a support for many such dreamers who are in need.

info.title: Aspire - Don't aspire to make a living, Aspire to make a difference
info.description: We are here to make that difference by being a guide in the paths of the aspirer's education.

info.title: Do - You are what you do, not what you say you'll do
info.description: We are here to do our part in reaching the unreached and do our best to uplift them.

activities.title: Career Guidance - 15 Feb 2019
activities.quote: Choose a job you love and you never have to work a day in your life
activities.description: Career planning is the usual issue every teenager will be facing during the stage of passing out from school life. They will be in a complete dilemma with lots and lots of questions lingering over their minds. Our team have reached the government schools in some areas of Chennai such as ChoolaiMedu, Aminjikarai and Nungambakkam. We briefed out all the career opportunities for the students belonging to various streams and clarified their doubts regarding their choice of career. We also suggested the foundations which are out there to help for higher education for the economically weak students.

activities.title: Wall Painting - 25 May 2019
activities.quote: Better keep yourself clean and bright; you are the window through which you see the world
activities.description: There is a famous proverb everyone of us must be aware of which is “Cleanliness is next to Godliness”. Our team have volunteered ourselves in creating such Godliness in a slum area nearby Triplicane, Chennai. We cleaned a barren land and the walls over there. We didn’t just stop ourselves in cleaning but also, we painted those walls and also made blackboards for the children residing around. We made the barren land colourful for the children.

activities.title: Tree Planting - 05 Jul 2019
activities.quote: He who plants a tree, plants a hope
activities.description: Planting tree is an investment made in nature to make our life comfortable. Our survival highly depends on trees as they are the oxygen and food providers for us. It is a contribution we make to our mother Earth. Thus, our team volunteered in reaching a school for small children in Purasaivakkam, cleaned the place over there and planted tree saplings. Also, we did gardening at that school to make the place much lively for the kids.

activities.title: Edunext - 23 Oct 2019
activities.quote: Education is the passport to future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today
activities.description: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. The weapon should be chosen wisely which needs proper guidance. EduNext is an event we started as a next step towards career guidance. Our team guided the students of XII grade to choose their education in a wiser way and create a bright future. We reached the students of Sri Muthukumaraswamy Devasthanam P Venugopal Chetty Higher Secondary School, Purasaivakkam and gave an idea on what they can choose after their school studies. We cleared all their doubts. We made them get rid of their fears in their mind on exams and also on their future. We gave a clear idea on the course which they can avail in various colleges for different streams.

activities.title: Naan Veezhven Endru Ninaithayo - 08 Dec 2019
activities.quote: Peace can only last where human rights are respected
activities.description: Naan Veezhven Endru Ninaithayo is an event which collected more than 5000 manuscripts on human rights which was organized by Social Protection Organization. Our team volunteered ourselves for the whole event and also supported them in collecting the manuscripts from various people. Our team supported the whole event of award distribution. Also, with immense pleasure our team received an award for volunteering in that event from the hands of Mr.Ponraj Vellaichamy who was the P.A. of Dr. A.P.J.Abdul Kalam.

activities.title: Health camp - 12 Jan 2020
activities.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
activities.description: Health is the wealth that you need and that's why Team Kanaa wanted to be a part of the Health Camp that took place in Saligramam on 12.01.2020. Our volunteers guided and helped all the registered participants at the all health check up and dental check up podiums and at the blood donation drive.

activities.title: School Renovation - 10 Mar 2020
activities.quote: The heart of a volunteer is not measured by the size of his heart but the depth of his commitment to make a difference in the lives of others.
activities.description: This Project was an initiative to repaint and renovate a Government primary school at Thiruninravur by crowdfunding as the school needed major restoration and repairs. The project was successfully completed in the second founding year of Team Kanaa and our second anniversary was celebrated along with the students, teaching and non teaching staff of the school with the presence of our supporter and volunteers. Awards and mementos were presented to our well-wishes and volunteers. School furnitures, Computers and Educational materials were provided to the school students to encourage them.

activities.title: NEET batch 2020 - 13th July 2020 To 4th September 2020
activities.quote: Start where you are, Use what you have, Do what you can!
activities.description: Our dream of offering free and quality NEET coaching classes to deserving students became a reality on 13.07.2020- Team Kanaa's very first batch of Free Virtual NEET Coaching classes began with a set of Passionate and deserving NEET aspirants, experienced teachers and finest medical students.

activities.title: Edunext 2.0 - 2 Aug 2020
activities.description: Sometimes all that we need is the guidance of others because just listening to the experiences of a person will offer us wonderful life lessons that we can use to embark on our own journey. Team Kanaa organized a motivational talk cum webinar for all NEET aspirants and our own batch students to eliminate their worries and fears related to the NEET exam and to clarify all their career related doubts and queries from a professional. Dr. Prabhakar, an eminent Orthopedicaian answered all their queries in a hour long fun and interactive session by preparing and motivating them to face their exams confidently and enlightening them with different career options.

mission.description: Creating awareness among students about different educational opportunities and scholarships for college studies.
Offering career guidance programs to school students to enable them choose right career paths
To provide free NEET coaching classes to deserving and financially deprived students of both English and Tamil Medium
Putting in conscious efforts into doing better, being better people and in creating a better society
Networking and crowdfunding for  deserving social causes
Participating and offering our volunteering services for social causes

awards.heading: Award for Volunteering and Participating at the Kalam Book of Records event by contributing to the largest manuscript On World Human Rights Day
Best Organization award at the Social Protection International Peace conference and SPT Peace Awards 2020.
Award for Volunteering support at the Medical Camp in Saligramam
Award for school Renovation of P.U.P.S Govt school , Jamin Korattur by SSA Tamilnadu.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Jayaroshini  - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I have been part of Team Kanaa for the past two years as a mentor and moderator.More than an organization we have been a supportive family even when we had good times and bad times.From our Team I have learned and improved several skills which couldn't be taught anywhere else, I gained a greater understanding of people, interactions with strangers, handling difficult situations, taking concern of others problems, t and best parts of us is even we never forget´s to celebrate the tiniest joys.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Deepika S - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I'm the one who is keen to do volunteering and Kanaa gives me that opportunity to explore this new experience and I usually feel shy to talk with strangers but at Team Kanaa, I have overcome this and the things I do here makes me feels like - I am also a  part of their success and makes me feel great that I have helped someone in indirectly and that's great and I feel satisfied.Apart from this I had a great family here .

volunteerTestimonials.name: G Varsha - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: It's been a marvelous experience to be one of the volunteers in Team Kana. Educating students for the first time has been a great thing and I feel very happy to be a part of this. Team Kanaa especially taught me to be kind and interactive with students and even to strangers and has taught me teamwork, certain technical aspects.The bond between us is incredible and I wish it remains the same.Every moment is an experience in Team Kanaa.

volunteerTestimonials.name: D Sabithra - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I am a volunteer in Team Kanaa. Helping students education wise was my long term desire and it has come true in Team Kanaa. 5 months back Team Kanaa gave me a wonderful chance to make my desire come true and now I'm helping my fellow sisters and brothers to achieve their dreams. It is  very satisfying to know that i'm a part of the Team Kanaa family. All the brothers and sisters in this Kanaa family are a big support to my career also.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Mythili - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I like to do volunteer work but I didn't get any opportunities before Kanaa. This is my first experience. I am really happy that they are supporting deserving medical aspirants who are not able to pay money for coaching classes.Kanaa helped me gain confidence in public speaking, talking to students and also showed me that this is a job where I will need to work hard. I learned many things form kanaa, how to work with others and adjust with other people.I am glad to be a part of this family

volunteerTestimonials.name: P Pavithra - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Volunteer
volunteerTestimonials.description: I am very happy to be a part of the Kanaa team. I got to know about Kanaa after I had seen my friend's WhatsApp status.And I voluntarily approached her and joined this wonderful family. I  just joined two or three months back. And I have done only small activities. But I totally enjoyed it.Currently I am in the paper correction team...After getting a bit experienced I would like to be in all teams. First of all I would like to thank my seniors for guiding me. Not only for this and also for leading us in the right way.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Sandhiya - Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I'm the one who had the dream to become a doctor & work in Indian army, but I failed.Whenever I come across medical students wearing white coats ,I could feel something.But after joining this team and seeing Kanaa's effort towards students' dreams similar to the one I had in my past, it gives so much positivity,happiness and it felt something special and close to my heart because it is going to help a student just like me..And the Kanaa family members they are the kindest, lovable, patient, hard working people I ever met..

volunteerTestimonials.name: Amirthavarshini Sathiya - NEET Batch Trainer
volunteerTestimonials.description: I had a very good experience with the team's co-operation. I was a part of it for just a few days but that itself created a very good experience for me. The team was very supportive to the students. The trainers too have put a great effort from their side in spite of their own busy circumstances. As I have been a part of other training institutes, I have seen many students who were not able to afford the training. but Team Kanaa has taken a great initiative in making the dreams of many such students to be achieved.I will always continue to be a part of Team Kanaa.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Artheeswari P - Student at Sathyabama Institute of Science and Technology / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: Actually once upon a time I had a dream to become a doctor but I was unable to because of the NEET exams and also partially because of myself . But here team kanaa gives an opportunity to help students with dreams to become a doctor just like how i dreamt and that gives me a sense of satisfaction.I have learned how to give counselling as well as handle students. It's a great feeling to know that I'm also a part of their success.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Surya S R - PG Student at Crescent University / NEET Batch Trainer
volunteerTestimonials.description: I have been a trainer for a month. I have joined the team during september 2021 as a trainer for chemistry. I was given complete freedom to take classes and the timings are very flexible and all other trainers, moderators are very much supportive. I felt very comfortable with everything and the responses were very fast from the team. I feel that everything goes very systematically.

volunteerTestimonials.name: S DEVARAJ - Student at / Moderator
volunteerTestimonials.description: I joined Team Kanaa through my friend,Kanaa has given me a great opportunity to work with others and I am glad it has helped a student like me utilize my time properly.I would love to continue this volunteer work with Team Kanaa  and I will continue to do my best to help Team Kanaa

volunteerTestimonials.name: MOHAMED ARMOON SHALIQ - PG Student at VIT / NEET Batch Trainer
volunteerTestimonials.description: Team Kanaa is not only changing the lives of students but is also changing the lives of their upcoming generations. Education is the passport to the future,for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

volunteerTestimonials.name: Arjun S - PG Student at PSG / Volunteer
volunteerTestimonials.description: This team has helped improve the lives of a lot of children and I hope this work will be carried on for a very long time.

wellWishers.name: Dr. G.Merlin Sheeba, Professor -Well wisher
wellWishers.description: ‘You don't have to be Great to Start ,but you have to Start to be Great’.Kanaa team has reached a milestone of success stories within two years. Success is the sum of small efforts that are tried without stopping on seeing the obstacles. This inspiring energetic team are the supportive hands for many young aspirants. My dear Team, take pride in how far you have come. Have faith in how far you can go and enjoy the journey. My best wishes and support as always with the team.

wellWishers.name: Prof.Manjula Devi B (HOD at department Microbiology)- NEET Batch Trainer / Well-Wisher
wellWishers.description: I came to know about Kanaa through my Student.My experience with Team Kanaa is wonderful .I learnt from Team Kanaa that to help somebody needs not age or experience but we need a pure heart to help. I am amazed to see the youngsters involved in the service needed in the educational area.If u want to be Happy, help the needy people by providing free education because it helps the needy to grow as an individual & lead them a better life. May GOD shower his abundant blessings upon the Team Kanaa. May this Team Kanaa be a blessing to many people.

wellWishers.name: Boopathy R M.Sc., - NEET Batch Trainer / Well-Wisher
wellWishers.description: Team Kanaa is well equipped with trainers and moderators, showing determination and consistency. The moderators are responseful and collaborating with them is easy. These traits literally benefit students and trainers mutually.

studentTestimonials.name: Ponmozhi Ilayaraja - NEET Batch Student
studentTestimonials.description: Joining Team Kanaa's coaching class was my first step towards pursuing my passion. I was able to make a schedule and learn. I learnt that I must clarify my doubts then and there when it occurred. I learnt here that I should never lose my self confidence and to never give up easily on anything. I learnt the difference between the right ways and the wrong ways to prepare for exams from the ideas given by my trainers. Thanks to Team Kanaa for encouraging me and helping me overcome my fear of exams. Special thanks to my moderators, trainers and brother Stephan because of whom I was able to undergo my exams in a smooth manner.

studentTestimonials.name: Aasiya Zainap A - NEET Batch Student
studentTestimonials.description: I'm happy that I'm a student of kanaa and feel very good to be a part of Kanaa as a volunteer. This team has given me a lot of knowledge and courage to pursue my dream. All brothers and sisters of the team have always treated me as one of 'em. Best wishes for everyone in the Kanaa team to reach many unreachable students and make their dreams come true. This team has inspired me to do something for my society and I'll always be a part of Kanaa.Without any little expectation and benefits this team has been doing many things. I wished  'em all to do more and I wish all the golden hearts contributing to this team that they may reach great heights.

studentTestimonials.name: Priya Dharshini B - NEET Batch Student
studentTestimonials.description:
I came to know about Team Kanaa through my friend... 

 Team Kanaa is like a boon for students like me who have the desire to study but lack financial support. .Team Kanaa has taught me that when we must do anything without any expectations and the essence of the final result that we get will be priceless. When we do so we get more than what we desire. We must try to do good to others as much as we can.If I wouldn't have known about Team Kanaa, I wouldn't have had any scope for my NEET preparation. They are the ones who helped me to believe in myself. Thank you so much for that.

studentTestimonials.name: Maragadham - NEET Batch Student
studentTestimonials.description: I came to know about kanaa through my friends.I had such a good experience with the Kanaa team and the way they taught us was very good. I have learned alot from them through their tips ,advice and their motivation.Kanaa is such an amazing opportunity for me .Thank you all.

studentTestimonials.name: Ranjith - NEET Batch Student
studentTestimonials.description: Hi, I’m trainer Ram’s junior. I was preparing for NEET at that time. I saw his status and joined here. It's really great, I learned lots of things for my future, and still now moderators have been supporting me. It's really great work. Seriously, I am very blessed. This one year of travel with the kanaa team has become a part of my life and I'm really happy to join with you all.

journey.content: Career guidance for the XII grade students
Wall paintings for a slum area
EduNext Events to provide the pathway for the school students to enter into the next stage of their life
Assisting students to get higher education support
NEET coaching classes for the economically weak students
